A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Walked out feeling there were some great moments
But some characters were killed off way before they should have been your know who I mean... and I'm not sure if this is really setting up for an epic finale anymore. Feels like the past has been wiped away too soon . The humour fell Flat a few times and I'm really not sure about that Leia moment. The 2 hours 35 actually went quickly ...
Now I've seen episode 7 and 8 I'm more inclined to want to see the thrawn trilogy made even though there wouldn't be as many surprises as I've read the books. Perhaps we could have an alternate reality trilogy .
There's no comparison to rogue one which ended with my audience clapping. This one there was like a stunned silence as if to say what the hell just happened?
